basic.description: This course is the first part of an integrated sequence in dynamics, vibrations, and controls. Material in this first course includes the following: absolute and relative motion of particles and rigid bodies in inertial, translating, and rotating coordinate frames; derivation and computer solution of differential equations of motion; single degree of freedom vibrations and elementary feedback control.
basic.subject: EML
basic.title: Dynamic Systems I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: EML 3002 and EML 3004. Corequisite: MAP 3305 or MAP 2302.
